title: (Recruitment) Currently searching for Mid-Laner Gold + for Competitive Flex
body:
**Age of Innocence (AOI17) is currently seeking a gold+ mid-laner that is wanting to join a ranked flex team. You must be consistently active and have the desire to improve alongside the team. We are wanting to go competitive after we reach platinum tier for ranked flex. If you are interested, add me and swing me a message:**

**IGN:**

**_RazorRenegade_**

replies.body: Hey, still looking for player? I'm not a real Mid main but it is one of my most enjoyable lanes to paly and I would love yo get to grow with a team.
I'll msg once I'm home if you're still interested
In game name Syouran; D4- Solo/duo, Plat 5 Flex :^) add me if you don't already have a midlaner or need a sub :){{sticker:galio-happy}}

if you are looking for a competitive team, this is the place for you.

as the ADC for this team, everyone is chill and this team has a great learning environment.
I'm plat in solo queue can i join for the lols and i main mid ;)

can add me also if RazorRenegade is not available, IGN: Zami

anyone who wants to join should also be willing to accept constructive criticism, and do their best to keep a positive mindset during bad games.
